---
title: "Merge Left and Right Individual Sim Data"
output: html_document
date: "2023-01-17"
---

```{r}
d_acroph_left <- read.csv('../data/sim_data/acrophily/acrophily_sim_left_indiv.csv')
d_acroph_right <- read.csv('../data/sim_data/acrophily/acrophily_sim_right_indiv.csv')
d_acroph_indiv <- rbind(d_acroph_left, d_acroph_right)

d_diff_left <- read.csv('../data/sim_data/mean_abs_diff/mean_abs_diff_sim_left_indiv.csv')
d_diff_right <- read.csv('../data/sim_data/mean_abs_diff/mean_abs_diff_sim_right_indiv.csv')
d_diff_indiv <- rbind(d_diff_left, d_diff_right)
nrow(d_diff_indiv)

write.csv(d_acroph_indiv, '../data/sim_data/acrophily/acrophily_sim_indiv.csv')
write.csv(d_diff_indiv, '../data/sim_data/mean_abs_diff/mean_abs_diff_sim_indiv.csv')
```
